meaningThai: คำตอบที่เหมาะสม
examples: Select the most appropriate response.
Which response is appropriate in this context?

meaningThai: ต้องการมาก/ยาก
examples: The job is demanding but rewarding.
The exam is demanding for new learners.

meaningThai: เกินความคาดหมาย
examples: Sales exceeded expectations.
The product exceeded customer expectations.

meaningThai: บางส่วน
examples: The statement is partially true.
The project is partially completed.

meaningThai: คาดเดาได้
examples: The pattern is predictable from the chart.
The ending of the passage is predictable.

meaningThai: ไม่สม่ำเสมอ, ไม่สอดคล้อง
examples: The data is inconsistent across regions.
The speaker gives inconsistent information.

meaningThai: ประกาศ
examples: The speaker announces a schedule change.
The results will be announced tomorrow.

meaningThai: อย่างแม่นยำ
examples: Describe the chart accurately.
The instructions must be followed accurately.

meaningThai: ตรงไปตรงมา, ไม่ซับซ้อน
examples: The process is straightforward.
The passage gives a straightforward answer.

meaningThai: อย่างตรงไปตรงมา
examples: The question can be answered straightforwardly.
The instructions are explained straightforwardly.

meaningThai: สถานการณ์
examples: The decision depends on the circumstances.
Under no circumstances should you leave the room early.

meaningThai: อย่างไม่ต้องสงสัย
examples: This is undoubtedly the best answer.
The speaker is undoubtedly frustrated.

meaningThai: ยืนยันอย่างหนักแน่น
examples: The author asserts that technology has improved productivity.
Which idea does the speaker assert most strongly?

meaningThai: ครอบคลุม
examples: The report gives a comprehensive overview.
Choose the most comprehensive summary.

meaningThai: สำคัญมาก
examples: Time management is critical during the test.
The speaker mentions critical concerns.

meaningThai: เล็กน้อย
examples: There was only a marginal improvement.
Scores increased by a marginal amount.

meaningThai: ดำเนินการต่อ
examples: You may now proceed to the next question.
The train will proceed after the inspection.

meaningThai: จดจำข้อมูล
examples: Students must retain information from the passage.
Listening practice helps retain vocabulary.

meaningThai: เพียงพอ
examples: There is insufficient information to choose the answer.
We need sufficient evidence before concluding.

meaningThai: ส่วนใหญ่
examples: The passage is predominantly about climate change.
The region is predominantly rural.

meaningThai: ประมาณ
examples: Choose the approximate value shown in the chart.
The flight time is approximate.

meaningThai: การยอมรับ/การรับรู้
examples: The speaker gives an acknowledgment of the problem.
There is no acknowledgment of customer complaints.

meaningThai: สรุป
examples: Summarize the main point of the passage.
The chart summarizes last year’s performance.

meaningThai: รบกวน/ขัดขวาง
examples: Noise may interfere with the recording.
The outage interfered with production.

meaningThai: การเกิดขึ้น
examples: The passage describes the emergence of new technologies.
There was a sudden emergence of problems.

meaningThai: โดดเด่น
examples: The chart shows notable differences.
There is a notable change in tone.

meaningThai: ถูกต้องตามหลัก/น่าเชื่อถือ
examples: Which answer is valid based on the passage?
The ticket is valid for three days.

meaningThai: อย่างหลีกเลี่ยงไม่ได้
examples: The delay will inevitably affect the schedule.
Mistakes inevitably occur when rushing.

meaningThai: ความเข้าใจลึกซึ้ง
examples: The passage provides insight into modern education.
Listening carefully gives insight into the speaker's attitude.

meaningThai: ให้เหตุผลสนับสนุนคำตอบ
examples: Use the passage to justify your answer.
Which detail justifies the correct choice?

meaningThai: แตกต่างชัดเจน
examples: There are three distinct opinions in the passage.
The two trends are distinct from each other.

meaningThai: โดยพื้นฐาน
examples: The two views are fundamentally different.
The process is fundamentally simple.

meaningThai: การรับประกัน/ความมั่นใจ
examples: The speaker gives assurance that the plan is safe.
Warranty provides assurance to customers.

meaningThai: ตอบสนองอย่างเหมาะสม
examples: Respond appropriately to the caller’s request.
The test checks your ability to respond appropriately.

meaningThai: ประเมินหลักฐาน
examples: Evaluate the evidence before choosing the answer.
The author uses evidence that must be evaluated carefully.

meaningThai: ไม่พึงประสงค์, เป็นผลลบ
examples: The plan may have adverse effects.
Adverse weather delayed the flight.

meaningThai: ค่าประมาณ
examples: Choose the approximate value shown on the graph.
The measurement is only an approximate value.

meaningThai: ข้อมูลที่เข้าถึงง่าย
examples: The website provides accessible information.
Accessible information is needed for fair testing.

meaningThai: คำอธิบายทางเลือก
examples: What is the best alternative explanation for the event?
The author offers no alternative explanation.

meaningThai: ท้ายที่สุดนำไปสู่
examples: Lack of planning ultimately leads to delays.
The changes ultimately led to higher performance.

meaningThai: สอดคล้องกัน
examples: The graph corresponds with the passage.
His statement does not correspond with the facts.

meaningThai: คำอธิบายอย่างสั้น
examples: Provide a brief explanation for your answer.
The speaker gives a brief explanation of the delay.

meaningThai: การพิจารณา
examples: Cost is an important consideration.
Several considerations must be reviewed.

meaningThai: รูปแบบที่คาดเดาได้
examples: The chart shows a predictable pattern.
A predictable pattern appears in the report.

meaningThai: โต้ตอบ/ปฏิสัมพันธ์
examples: The test measures your ability to interact naturally.
Children interact differently with technology.

meaningThai: มีอิทธิพล
examples: The speaker is highly influential in the field.
Which influential factor is mentioned?

meaningThai: สามารถทำได้จริง
examples: The proposal is not financially viable.
The author questions whether the plan is viable.

meaningThai: ตีความกราฟ
examples: Interpret the chart to find the correct answer.
The question asks you to interpret the chart accurately.

meaningThai: ขึ้นอยู่กับ
examples: The outcome is dependent on several factors.
Success is dependent on preparation.

meaningThai: บิดเบือน
examples: The data may be distorted by measurement error.
The speaker’s message was distorted by noise.

meaningThai: คำอธิบายที่ง่ายและตรงไปตรงมา
examples: The passage offers a straightforward explanation.
Which option gives the most straightforward explanation?

meaningThai: ปรากฏบ่อย
examples: These words commonly appear in reading tests.
Graphs commonly appear in the IELTS exam.

meaningThai: อย่างรุนแรง/อย่างมาก
examples: Prices increased drastically last year.
The situation has drastically changed.

meaningThai: ง่ายดาย, อย่างเต็มใจ
examples: Information is readily available online.
Employees readily accepted the new policy.

meaningThai: อย่างไม่แน่ใจ/อย่างคร่าว ๆ
examples: The schedule is tentatively set for next Friday.
The speaker tentatively agrees with the proposal.

meaningThai: ประเมินต่ำไป
examples: Do not underestimate the difficulty of the exam.
The team underestimated the time required.

meaningThai: ประเมินสูงไป
examples: The manager overestimated the budget.
Many students overestimate their speaking ability.

meaningThai: คำถามที่ไม่ซับซ้อน
examples: This is a straightforward question based on the passage.
The speaker asks a straightforward question.

meaningThai: ประเมินความเข้าใจของคุณ
examples: This section assesses your understanding of the text.
The questions are designed to assess your understanding.
